org.apache.flex.compiler.fxg.dom

Interface IFXGNode

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IFillNode, IFilterNode, IMaskableNode, IMaskingNode, IStrokeNode, ITextNode, ITransformNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCharacterTextNode, AbstractFillNode, AbstractFilterNode, AbstractFXGNode, AbstractRichBlockTextNode, AbstractRichParagraphNode, AbstractRichTextLeafNode, AbstractRichTextNode, AbstractShapeNode, AbstractStrokeNode, AbstractTextNode, AbstractTransformNode, BevelFilterNode, BitmapFillNode, BitmapGraphicNode, BlurFilterNode, BRNode, BRNode, CDATANode, ColorMatrixFilterNode, ColorTransformNode, ContentPropertyNode, DefinitionNode, DelegateNode, DivNode, DropShadowFilterNode, EllipseNode, FlexGraphicNode, FlexParagraphNode, FlexRichTextNode, FlexSpanNode, FlexTextGraphicNode, GlowFilterNode, GradientBevelFilterNode, GradientEntryNode, GradientGlowFilterNode, GraphicContentNode, GraphicNode, GroupDefinitionNode, GroupNode, ImgNode, LibraryNode, LinearGradientFillNode, LinearGradientStrokeNode, LineNode, LinkNode, MaskPropertyNode, MatrixNode, ParagraphNode, ParagraphNode, PathNode, PlaceObjectNode, RadialGradientFillNode, RadialGradientStrokeNode, RectNode, RichTextNode, SolidColorFillNode, SolidColorStrokeNode, SpanNode, SpanNode, TabNode, TCYNode, TextGraphicNode, TextLayoutFormatNode, TextPropertyNode

    public interface IFXGNode
    Implementations of IFXGNode represent a node in the DOM of an FXG document.

    • Method Detail

      • getNodeName

        String getNodeName()
        Returns:
        The XML element name of this node.

      • getNodeURI

        String getNodeURI()
        Returns:
        The namespace URI of this node.

      • addChild

        void addChild(IFXGNode child,
            Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Adds an FXG child node to this node.
        Parameters:
        child - - a child FXG node to be added to this node.
        problems - problem collection used to collect problems occurred within this method

      • getDocumentNode

        IFXGNode getDocumentNode()
        Returns:
        The root node of the FXG document.

      • setDocumentNode

        void setDocumentNode(IFXGNode root)
        Establishes the root node of the FXG document containing this node.
        Parameters:
        root - - the root node of the FXG document.

      • getDocumentPath

        String getDocumentPath()
        Returns:
        - the path of the FXG file being processed.

      • setAttribute

        void setAttribute(String name,
                String value,
                Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Sets an FXG attribute on this node.
        Parameters:
        name - - the unqualified attribute name
        value - - the attribute value
        problems - problem collection used to collect problems occurred within this method

      • getStartLine

        int getStartLine()
        Returns:
        the line on which the node declaration started.

        Parameters:
        line - - the line on which the node declaration started.

        Returns:

      • getEndLine

        int getEndLine()
        Returns:
        the line on which the node declaration ended.

      • setEndLine

        Parameters:

      • getChildren

        List<IFXGNode> getChildren()
        debug method, do not use
